long_description: Upgrade your CamelBak hydration reservoir (sold separately) to handle extreme winter and summer weather with the Antidote(TM) Thermal Control kit(TM). Includes a 42 in. delivery tube, insulated tube cover, Big Bite(TM) valve mouthpiece and a mouthpiece cover. Antidote(TM) Thermal Control kit(TM) helps prevent your water from freezing in winter and helps keep your water cool in summer.
short_description: Upgrade your CamelBak hydration reservoir (sold separately) to handle extreme winter and summer weather with the Antidote(TM) Thermal Control kit(TM).
